case_title: Haji GHULAM RASOOL vs ALLAH DITTA And Other

facts.reason_for_absence: Petitioner's wife was seriously ill and he had gone to consult the doctor.

legal_provisions.challenged_order: O. IX, R. 8, Civil Procedure Code
legal_provisions.application_for_setting_aside: O. IX, R. 9, Civil Procedure Code
legal_provisions.correct_provision_for_order: O. XVII, R. 2, Civil Procedure Code

appellant: Case could not be legally dismissed under O. IX, R. 8, Civil Procedure Code as only arguments were pending.
Court should have waited until the end of the day.
key_arguments.respondent: Resisted the application for setting aside dismissal.

evidence.appellant: Dr. Abdul Aziz testified that the appellant visited him regarding his wife's illness.

reasoning: Absence was unintentional as appellant appeared within 15 minutes of dismissal.
Dismissal under O. IX, R. 8, Civil Procedure Code was not appropriate as arguments were pending.
Court could have waited until the end of the day or heard arguments from the other side.
court_decision.order: Appeal allowed, dismissal set aside, case remanded to Subordinate Judge, Bahawalpur for disposal in accordance with law.
